content: @Brett Marquard and I need clarification on constraints on references. If a profile defines one type for a reference ( for example DocumentReference with subject.reference = Patient), then are other types still valid in an instance (for example subject.reference = Group ). Currently the validator allows it but the Snapshot in the IG will only show the profiled types.

when I read this:

http://hl7.org/fhir/elementdefinition-definitions.html#ElementDefinition.type.profile:

...If any profiles are specified, then the content must conform to at least one of them....

Seems to suggest can only use the types enumerated in the Profile.
Sounds like the validator is wrong. Can you make up a test case? (instance + profile)

Is there a specific format for test data or just an instance like here:
https://gist.github.com/Healthedata1/738c837366942c74edb2b782e8049629
@Eric Haas ok I got to the bottom of this - you need to use the assumeValidRestReferences parameter
